mouseoverbookmarks.author: Jaffob
mouseoverbookmarks.description: Move your mouse over a folder on the Bookmarks Toolbar to open it immediately, rather than having to click.
mouseoverbookmarks.name: mouseoverbookmarks

preferences.description: How long you must hover over the bookmark folder before it opens.
preferences.name: openDelay
preferences.title: Menu open delay (milliseconds)

preferences.description: How long the mouse is away from the bookmark before it closes.
preferences.name: closeDelay
preferences.title: Menu close delay (milliseconds)

preferences.description: May help prevent opening folders accidentally.
preferences.name: approach

options.label: Only open folders when approaching from above
Only open folders when approaching from below

preferences.title: Approach direction
